code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/lodgings';var create=function create(data){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,data);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var get_current=function get_current(){var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/current"));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{create:create,update:update,get_current:get_current};
